alert.note: Alert for Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 03 at 6:24PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Florida, including the following county, Lee. * WHEN...Until 800 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 624 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, East Dunbar, Buckingham, Pine Manor, Villas, Southwest Florida Airport, Lochmoor Waterway Estates, Palmona Park, McGregor, Cypress Lake, Olga, San Carlos Park, Three Oaks, Tice, Page Field Airport, Page Park, Gateway, Fort Myers Villas and Whiskey Creek. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
